author: dmitrijus
body:
These modules do something weird in endJob:
- filling histograms (previously booked);
- output debug (or summary) info.

However, endJob was replaced with endStream (the former is obsolete and undefined).
Modules should work fine in a single-stream setup, but may fail horribly with multiple streams.

SU ./DQMOffline/Alignment/interface/MuonAlignment.h
SU ./DQMOffline/CalibMuon/interface/DTnoiseDBValidation.h
SU ./DQMOffline/CalibMuon/interface/DTt0DBValidation.h

Dmitrijus
title: Migration to the thread-safe DQM: second batch
